record.field: Administration
Documents related to company administration, including internal policies, procedures, and official correspondence.
Project
All documents concerning ongoing and completed projects, including plans, reports, and agreements.
Marketing
Materials and documents related to marketing strategies, campaigns, and promotional activities.
Organization
Documents related to company structure, human resources, and organizational development.
Finance
Financial documents including invoices, budgets, accounting reports, and tax filings.
Legal
Legal contracts, compliance documents, court cases, and regulatory correspondence.
Human Resources
Employee records, recruitment documents, training materials, and HR policies.
IT
Documents related to IT infrastructure, software licenses, system documentation, and support tickets.
Sales
Sales reports, client contracts, quotations, and order documentation.
Quality Assurance
Procedures, audits, test reports, and compliance documents related to quality management.
Research & Development
Documentation of research projects, development plans, prototypes, and innovation reports.
NDA
Non-Disclosure Agreements and confidentiality documents related to projects.
PIT
Documents related to Personal Income Tax (PIT) matters and filings.
